thread.title: Students remove rat from their bathroom with mop and broom | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Students remove rat from their bathroom with mop and broom | Daily Mail Online

author: Alice Evans For Mailonline
title: Students remove rat from their bathroom with mop and broom | Daily Mail Online
text: Share One of the students, Logan, then coaxed the critter from its hiding place. When the rat ran out of the bathroom another housemate swiped it down the stairs with a mop. Jody Mackin's video of the ordeal she faced with her housemates has now been favourited more than 206,000 times on Twitter The stunned rodent tried to take cover after bouncing down the stairs. But Logan's boyfriend, Bo, was ready and waiting to strike with a broom, and unceremoniously batted the disorientated rodent out of the open front door. Jody's caption on her Tweet said: 'We came up with this ridiculous plan to get this rat out of our house and IT ACTUALLY WORKED!!!! BYE B****' Jody stood on a stool behind a bucket which blocked one of potential escape routes the rat could have taken. The critter's only option was to run on to the landing where it was promptly swiped down the stairs with a mop, right The girls had dealt with a rat problem before, according to Buzzfeed . Jody told the news site: 'We had a rat last year right around this time and it was huge.' The friends caught the first rat in a trap, but this time they wanted to try to free the pest without killing it. Jody added: 'We were all freaking out.' The friends caught another rat in a trap last year, but this time they wanted to try to free the pest without killing it. They succeeded and can be seen screaming and celebrating after the rat is batted out of the open door by Logan's boyfriend, Bo Read more:
